sectionHeader.title: How TradeGPT Works
sectionHeader.description: From market data to actionable signals in seconds. No noise, just clear trading decisions.

steps.title: Data Collection
steps.description: TradeGPT pulls real-time data from multiple exchanges, analyzing price action, volume, and market sentiment.

steps.title: Sentiment Analysis
steps.description: Our AI monitors social media, news, and market sentiment to gauge investor psychology and market mood.

steps.title: Macroeconomic Analysis
